  • Method Details

    • canCastle

      public boolean canCastle(int x, int y, Board board, boolean right)
      Check whether the king can castle from the given location in the specified direction.
      Parameters:
      x - x-coordinate on the board
      y - y-coordinate on the board
      board - Board object which contains all the pieces and their locations
      right - the direction in which to castle
      Returns:
      true if castle is allowed or false otherwise
